Name: Average time from 'Request Payment' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time for cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' until 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time between 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time to 'Payment Handled' after 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total waiting time to 'Payment Handled' after all approvals are received
Metric: the sum of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' or `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' or `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' or `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time it takes 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time it takes 'Payment Handled' from the first submission by employee
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'Payment Handled' after 'Request Payment' is made
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Request Payment' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Payment Handled' for cases that were eventually approved
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'
